title: Discover Swan Hill Wineries
text:
Discover Swan Hill Wineries By Nicole Kennelly | Submitted On July 19, 2015 
Swan Hill, located on the banks of the Murray River in Victoria is renowned for its rich culture, beautiful year round weather, delicious local produce and its growing love for wine. With the relaxed lifestyle surrounding the Murray River, holidaying in Swan Hill while enjoying the local wineries makes for a perfect break. 
Swan Hill Wineries The Swan Hill region has Mediterranean style climate and soil ideal for crops, including grapes. The area's warm weather produces beautiful bodied grapes perfect for Pinot Gris and Shiraz, but also as the wine industry has grown within Swan Hill new wineries have opened and new grape varieties have been planted, creating a new range of interesting local wines for visitors to discover. 
From major to boutique wineries stippled along the weaving country roads, visitors can explore the locally grown wines while often meeting the winemakers themselves. The winemakers take pride in their work and can often be found mingling with the visitors, explaining their blends and vine approach. Many wineries and cellar doors even offer wood fire pizzas, alfresco lunches and riverside picnics. 
Andrew Peace Wines Located on the banks of the Murray River, Andrew Peace Wines was established in the 1960's and has grown to be one of the largest Australian family owned wineries sourced from its own vineyards across Australia. The winery is open for tastings, provides picnic facilities and a pizza oven for visitors. 
Buller Wines - Beverford Winery The Buller family started making wines in 1921. Their Cellar Door lets visitors get acquainted with a range of their wines, including their award winning Muscat and Tokay. Buller Wines offers complimentary tastings with beautiful gardens for wine goers to picnic or enjoy a tasting in their newly renovated underground cellar with a rustic industrial atmosphere. 
Robinvale Organic & Bio - Dynamic Wines Another local family owned winery established in 1976 is known for their renowned Quality Bio Dynamic and Organic Wines. These full-flavoured pure 100 per cent grape juice wines can be tasted at their Cellar Door for free and offer a mail order service Australia wide for any wines you fall in love with. 
Trentham Estate With views of the flowing Murray River, the Trentham Estate offers tastings of award winning wines at their Cellar Door. Their restaurant is known for their Australian cuisine with a European flair made with local produce. Another fun option is the 'cook-your-own' barbecue lunch for visitors to enjoy with friends and family. 
Lindeman's Karadoc Winery The Lindeman's Karadoc Winery offers an experience like no other for visitors wanting to create their own blends of wine. At the winery they will bottle up your creation so you can share your blend with your family and friends. They also offer premium wine tastings, beautiful picnic views and barbecue areas. 
Amongst the slow paced lifestyle along the Murray River and the hospitable community, the growing wineries offer an experience like no other. For those looking for Swan Hill accommodation situated conveniently for wine excursions and local relaxation the Comfort Inn Campbell is perfect for your business or leisure needs.
